Uses of Class
org.gearvrf.GVRContext

  • Packages that use GVRContext 
    Package Description
    org.gearvrf
    You need to understand key points of this package to create a GVRF application.
    org.gearvrf.animation
    GVRF animations, version 2.0.
    org.gearvrf.asynchronous
    Implementation of asynch resource loading.
    org.gearvrf.debug
    Miscellaneous debugging utilities.
    org.gearvrf.periodic
    Schedule Runnables to run on the GL thread, in the future.
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects
    Specialized scene objects

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GVRContext GVRHybridObject.getGVRContext()
      Get the GVRContext this object is attached to.

      abstract void GVRScript.onInit(GVRContext gvrContext)
      Called when the GL surface is created, when your app is loaded.

      Create a new, grayscale texture, from an array of luminance bytes.

      Constructs a camera rig without cameras attached.
      GVRCubemapTexture(GVRContext gvrContext, Bitmap[] bitmapArray)
      Constructs a cube map texture using six pre-existing Bitmaps.

      Create a float-point texture.
      GVRMaterial(GVRContext gvrContext)
      A convenience overload: builds a GVRMaterial that uses the most common stock shader, the 'unlit' shader.
      GVRMaterial(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMaterialShaderId shaderId)
      A new holder for a shader's uniforms.

      Constructor.

      Constructs a GVRRenderTexture for a frame buffer of the specified size, with MSAA enabled at the specified sample count.
      GVRScene(GVRContext gvrContext)
      Constructs a scene with a camera rig holding left & right cameras in it.

      Constructs an empty scene object with a default transform.
      GVRSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, float width, float height)
      Constructs a rectangular scene object, whose geometry is completely specified by the width and height.
      GVRSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, float width, float height, GVRTexture texture)
      Constructs a 2D, rectangular scene object that uses the standard 'unlit shader' to display a texture.
      GVRSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, float width, float height, GVRTexture texture, GVRMaterialShaderId shaderId)
      Create a standard, rectangular texture object, using a non-default shader to apply complex visual affects.

      Very high-level constructor that asynchronously loads the mesh and texture.
      GVRSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRAndroidResource mesh, GVRAndroidResource texture)
      Very high-level constructor that asynchronously loads the mesh and texture.
      GVRSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh)
      Constructs a scene object with an arbitrarily complex mesh.
      GVRSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, GVRTexture texture)
      Constructs a scene object with an arbitrarily complex geometry that uses the standard 'unlit shader' to display a texture.
      GVRSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, GVRTexture texture, GVRMaterialShaderId shaderId)
      The base texture constructor: Constructs a scene object with an arbitrarily complex geometry that uses a specific shader to display a texture.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GVRAnimationEngine GVRAnimationEngine.getInstance(GVRContext gvrContext)
      The animation engine is an optional part of GVRF: You do have to call getInstance() to lazy-create the singleton.

      Constructors in org.gearvrf.scene_objects with parameters of type GVRContext 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRCameraSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, float width, float height, Camera camera)
      Create a 2D, rectangular scene object that shows live video from one of the device's cameras
      GVRCameraSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, Camera camera)
      Create a scene object (with arbitrarily complex geometry) that shows live video from one of the device's cameras
      GVRConeSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext)
      Constructs a cone scene object with a height of 1, and a radius of 0.5.
      GVRCubeSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext)
      Constructs a cube scene object with each side of length 1.
      GVRCylinderSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext)
      Constructs a cylinder scene object with a height of 1, radius of 0.5,2 stacks, and 36 slices.
      GVRCylinderSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, float bottomRadius, float topRadius, float height, int stackNumber, int sliceNumber)
      Constructs a cylinder scene object.
      GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext)
      Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and 18 stacks, and 36 slices.
      GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRActivity gvrActivity)
      Shows a TextView on a scene object with both view's default height and width and quad's default height and width.
      GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRActivity gvrActivity, java.lang.CharSequence text)
      Shows a TextView on a scene object with both view's default height and width and quad's default height and width.
      GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRActivity gvrActivity, float width, float height, java.lang.CharSequence text)
      Shows a TextView on a scene object with view's default height and width.
      GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRActivity gvrActivity, float width, float height, int viewWidth, int viewHeight, java.lang.CharSequence text)
      Shows a TextView on a scene object.
      GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, GVRActivity gvrActivity, java.lang.CharSequence text)
      Shows a TextView on a scene object with view default height and width.
      GVRTextViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, GVRActivity gvrActivity, int viewWidth, int viewHeight, java.lang.CharSequence text)
      Shows a TextView on a scene object.
      GVRVideoSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, float width, float height, MediaPlayer mediaPlayer, int videoType)
      Play a video on a 2D, rectangular scene object, using the Android MediaPlayer
      GVRVideoSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, MediaPlayer mediaPlayer, int videoType)
      Play a video on a scene object with an arbitrarily complex geometry, using the Android MediaPlayer
      GVRWebViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, float width, float height, WebView webView)
      Shows a web page in a 2D, rectangular scene object.
      GVRWebViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, WebView webView)
      Shows a web page on a scene object with an arbitrarily complex geometry.
